messages.speech:
The page title is : “RESEARCH AREA. energy”
The subtitle is : We designed our energy infrastructure nearly a century ago — and we are rapidly outgrowing it. How might we redesign our energy systems to more efficiently serve our needs?

Behind the title section is a black and white image of wind turbines.

I found 3 page sections laid out vertically. Would you like me to read them out or do something else?
